itemDescription: Major General, Governor of Sindh, and Commander-in-Chief in British India (1782-1853)

wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Charles James Napier,  (; 10 August 1782 – 29 August 1853) was an officer and veteran of the British Army's Peninsular and 1812 campaigns, and later a Major General of the Bombay Army, during which period he led the military conquest of Sindh, before serving as the Governor of Sindh, and Commander-in-Chief in India.
